Double tap to lock On your home screen To be able to use double tap to lock, you have to enable admin access for Launcher. This is a secure lock, meaning you have to enter your PIN on the next unlock, if you have any. By disabling admin access, you will not be able to use double tap to lock on your home screen.

ALauncher is already your default launcher %s is currently your default launcher. To try the ALauncher, go to Settings, tap Clear Defaults, and press the Home button. %s is currently your default launcher. To try the ALauncher, select it from Settings > Home. %s is currently your default launcher. To try the ALauncher, select Settings, then select Home.
